title: Can you fix your client?
body:
Getting a leave because the client hangs on champion select once every 10 games is getting on my nerves. I wish I could say it was my PC, but it's happening to a few other people and we all have different PC's.

Also, the client also hangs during champion load, so there are two things I have to avoid.

Sick client.

replies.body: can there just be a boards section called riot haters? cause im a little tired o f their whining

Sounds like a connection issue or a dodgy install, you can troubleshoot connection here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If that doesn't help then likely it's a dodgy client install. This is usually caused by permissions errors but anything interfering with the patching process (certain 3rd party apps) can also cause this. Set up your permissions first then run a client repair:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions

If that still hasn't fixed the problem then you'll have to look a little deeper. Download the Hextech Repair Tool and run a clean install, also tell it to collect your logs so if the issue persists you can pass them through to support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
